qas.question: For how long does the biannual break from government last?
For how long does the biannual break from factory work  last?
Which day is usually marked with parties at various Island Stores?
What is the break that begins on News Year Day from?
In which year did the Island Store close a week later than normal due to inventory shortages?

context: There is an annual break from <b3_0>government and factory work<b3_0/> which begins before Christmas and lasts for <b0_0><b1_0>3 weeks<b1_0/><b0_0/>. <b2_0>Break-Up Day<b2_0/> is usually marked with parties at various work "departments". Break-Up includes the Island Store, which means that families must be organised to have a full larder of provisions during the period. In <b4_0>2013<b4_0/>, the Island Store closed a week earlier than usual to conduct a comprehensive inventory, and all purchases had to be made by Friday 13 December as the shop did not open again until a month later.
